motiondetection: support motion detection, IO alarm linkage front-end storage device
remotecontrol: Support uniform client and platform system application
playback: Support front end storage ,playback and download
illumination: Color 0.1Lux at F1.2,B/W0.01 Lux at F1.2
networkinterface: RJ45 Ethernet ,10/100 M adaptive; support RTSP/FTP/PPPOE/DHCP/DDNS/NTP/UPNP etc. protocol
sdk: Supply complete SDK for second development.
